author: Dawn Lim
title: GUSH: Fed Taps BLACKROCK to Purchase Bonds for Government...

content:
The Federal Reserve on Tuesday asked BlackRock Inc. to steer tens of billions of dollars in bond purchases, a reflection of the influence of the worlds largest money manager.
